text: Abraham ne wanga gi Melchizedek dahi baahi e madangaholu o ana goloo ala ne kae i tauwa. (Di ingoo o Melchizedek dono hadinga e dahi e hai bolo “Di King o di Tonu”. Idimaa mee dela di king o Salem, malaa, dono ingoo e hai dono hadinga labelaa bolo “Di King o di Aumaalia”).7.2 Tadinga o di bida helekai Salem i telekai Hebrew la go “Di aumaalia”
